decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (2014050 102 received 12 August 2014) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted and of the adjoining flat roof of the original rear projection shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a rear roof and rear mansard roof extension with a Juliet balcony and two front roof windows to the flat
